text: (ovun pavasana ayurin) niyata vasayenma (venat) kuranayak tibi emagin kandu gaman karavanu læbuve nam ho emagin mahapolova ven karanu læbuve nam ho emagin malavun kata karavanu læbuve nam ho (ovuhu visvasa nokarati.) namut siyalu karunu allah satuya. allah abhimata karanne nam siyalu janaya hata ohu maga penvannata tibunu bava visvasa kalavun nodæna sitiyo da? allahge pratignava pæminena tek pratiksepa kalavun ovun sidu kala dæ hetuven ovunata arbudayak æti vima ho ovunge nagarayata samipayen eya(arbuda ya) sidu vima akhanda va pavatinu æta. niyata vasayenma allah pratigna va kada nokarayi
